oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of Allegiance for Joseph Warren Van Meter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oath states that Third Sgt. Joseph W. Van Meter, Co. E, 1st Arkansas Infantry Regiment, has "given solemn obligation not to take up arms against the Government of the United States until properly released from this obligation." He was permitted to return home and remain undisturbed by Federal authorities. Joseph Warren Van Meter (1837-1903) served in two regiments: Co. K, 7th Arkansas Infantry Regiment and Co. E, 1st Arkansas Infantry Regiment, CSA.
